card.name: Banish
card.description: Target creature returns to your opponent's hand and costs 2 more (but not above 12).

card.name: Blood Ritual
card.description: Deals 2 damage to all friendly creatures on a node, then deals that damage to an enemy target

card.name: Shroud of Night
card.description: Changes time to Night

card.name: Tides of Chaos
card.description: Enemy creatures in target node take 2 damage during nighttime for 5 rounds

card.name: Bane
card.description: Deals 2 damage.

card.name: Beguiling Strike
card.description: Target creature's next attack inflicts fear.

card.name: Blight
card.description: Target creature is returned to your opponent

card.name: Chain Spirit
card.description: Target creature cannot be brought below 1 hp this round.

card.name: Death Whisper
card.description: Target creature takes 8 damage if isolated, or half that if in a group.

card.name: Delirium
card.description: Target creature cannot attune and has a 0.33 chance to attack the wrong enemy for 2 rounds.

card.name: Drain Soul
card.description: Deals 4 damage, heals friendly creature for 2.

card.name: Elusive
card.description: Friendly creature's next attack ignores guards.

card.name: Fear
card.description: Deals 1 damage and inflicts fear.

card.name: Fleshmelting Bolt
card.description: Deals 3 damage for 3 rounds.

card.name: Grim Transformation
card.description: Target friendly creature gains +3/+2

card.name: Shadow Barrage
card.description: Deals 6 damage to all enemies in node.

card.name: Shadow Orb
card.description: Deals 3 damage to 2 targets, chance to inflict fear

card.name: Duskmire Leech
card.description: There are things worse than mosquitoes in the muck beneath the Duskmire.

card.name: Carrion Crawler
card.description: Give them a few hours and they'll eat everything but the heart.

card.name: Faerie Dragon
card.description: They may not steal sheep or level towns, but they do have a nasty bite.

card.name: Hunting Dog
card.description: It takes more than a simple spell to throw off their scent.

card.name: Kiirish Sellsword
card.description: A handful of gold for a sword by your side: not a bad trade if you have a lot of enemies.

card.name: Half-Dragon Bladespinner
card.description: It takes inhuman strength and precision to spin a blade for that long.

card.name: Unstable Construct
card.description: Assembled from rubble and pure energy, it could burst apart at the softest touch.

card.name: Dire Wolf
card.description: Once you hear their howls, all you can do is pray they're after someone else.

card.name: Greyhoof Chieftan
card.description: Strongest of all the centaur, he bested many to gain his title.

card.name: Greyhoof Pikeman
card.description: More often than not, those who threaten the tribe find themselves on the end of a Greyhoof pike.

card.name: Karani Packlord
card.description: Pity those who threaten its kin.

card.name: Karani Shaman
card.description: The Karani are timid explorers, except in the realm of voodoo magics.

card.name: Earth Elemental
card.description: Even the ground beneath our feet can be changed with enough mana.

card.name: Fire Elemental
card.description: They're born when spent mana merges with flame.

card.name: Giant Centipede
card.description: What were they feeding that thing??

card.name: Water Elemental
card.description: All that excess mana has to go somewhere. Next time don't wash your car with it.

card.name: Wind Elemental
card.description: A swirling tempest starving for more energy, it was born of wind and mana.

card.name: Arakki Battlelord
card.description: Master tacticians, the Arakki thrive on the front lines.

card.name: Hill Giant
card.description: They're as massive as a boulder. As smart as one too.

card.name: Storm Giant
card.description: The winds pick up, the waves thrash about, and from the fog he emerges.

card.name: Gargantuan Treant
card.description: Its duty is to protect the forests. They are usually quite passive, unless you start a fire.

card.name: Stone Giant
card.description: Besides the occasional meal, they spend most of their time lying dormant in caves.

card.name: Chained Goliath
card.description: They used to prey on humanity, now they're our slaves.

card.name: Angry Walrus
card.description: Roughly 15.4 times stronger than an average walrus.

card.name: Demigod
card.description: The power of a god with the temperment of a human. What could possibly go wrong?

card.name: Elder Dragon
card.description: Its claws can pierce through stone; its roar can shatter bones.

card.name: World Guardian
card.description: Built in The Forgotten Ages. They awaken when the world's fate is threatened.

card.name: Form Ranks
card.description: All friendly creatures may move positions

card.name: Inspire
card.description: Gives friendly creatures +2 attack for 1 turn

card.name: Rally
card.description: Draws the next two creatures in your deck

card.name: Clairvoyance
card.description: View the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck.

card.name: Fireball
card.description: Deals 8 damage.

card.name: Remain Vigilant
card.description: Target friendly creature guards

card.name: Silence
card.description: Target creature is silenced.

card.name: Swap
card.description: Swaps the positions of 2 allied creatures

card.name: Divine Omen
card.description: Drains all remaining mana (x), heals creature for 2 damage at the end of each round for x rounds

card.name: Hallowed Ground
card.description: No new enemy creatures can enter target node during daytime for 3 rounds

card.name: Sanctuary
card.description: Friendly creatures in target node take no damage this round.

card.name: Daybreak
card.description: Changes time to Day

card.name: Sun Corona
card.description: Deals 4 damage to all enemy creatures on target node. Can only be used during day.

card.name: Divine Blessing
card.description: Target friendly creature gains +2/+3

card.name: Purify
card.description: Removes all debuffs from target creature.

card.name: Smite
card.description: Deals 6 damage.

card.name: Restoration
card.description: Target creature heals 3 health for 2 rounds.

card.name: True Strike
card.description: Target creature's next attack deals double damage

card.name: Sunburst
card.description: A shining burst of 5 damage
